product_name: CliniqueDramatically Different Moisturizing Gel For Face
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Dramatically Different Face Moisturizing Gel is a dermatologist-developed oil-free face moisturizer. Balances and refreshes oilier skin types.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Oily Combination and Oily (Types 3, 4).Delivers 8 hours of lightweight, oil-free hydration.Slips on easily, absorbs quickly.Create great skin with Clinique's twice-daily 3-Step Skincare System developed by a celebrated dermatologist.It's simple: cleanse with Facial Soap, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ or Oil-Free Gel. Each step is customized for your skin type.Dermatologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy testedBuilt on Dermatological Science: As a dermatologist-guided brand, Clinique's commitment to safety starts with skincare science. Clinique partners with the best minds in dermatology and formulate for all skin types, tones, concerns - in service of all skin.Key IngredientsSunflower seed cake, barley extract, and cucumber fruit extract help strengthen skin's barrier, improve its resiliency, and balance and retain skin's moisture levels.Hyaluronic acid acts as a natural moisture magnet/humectant.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSLSSLESSulfatesFragranceItem 2153924How To UseSpread moisturizing gel all over face/throat twice daily, or where needed. For best results, use after Facial Soap and Clarifying Lotion.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Butylene Glycol, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Glycerin, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Saccharomyces Lysate Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract / Extrait D'Orge, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, Caffeine, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria), Polysilicone-11, Silica, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Oleth-10, Lactobacillus Ferment, Laureth-23, Laureth-4, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate / VP Copolymer, Carbomer, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Tromethamine, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 4 (CI 14700), Yellow 6 (CI 15985).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Spread moisturizing gel all over face/throat twice daily, or where needed. For best results, use after Facial Soap and Clarifying Lotion.

reviews.headline: Will be buying again!
reviews.comments: Feels so silky.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Love how it makes your face feel.

reviews.headline: Best hydration I ever have
reviews.comments: I have 10 days using this moisturizer and my skin is soooo hydrated!

reviews.headline: BEST MOISTURIZER
reviews.comments: I have been using this moisturizer for 11 years and I don't think I will ever switch to another one unless for whatever reason they stop manufacturing it. It is so perfect, it does not leave your face greasy but rather it gives you a healthy and soft glow. Highly recommend to the girls with combo skin that are looking to elevate their every day skincare routine

reviews.headline: My skin can breathe
reviews.comments: I love how this makes my skin feel. My skin usually gets so oily in the t zone area. My make up use to always melt away. This controlled my oily skin but my skin still felt hydrated at the same time. It's amazing. My makeup stayed put and my skin felt so much healthier, cleaner. My face can finally breathe a sigh of relief. I don't look like greasy mess during the summer anymore.

reviews.headline: I would buy this and recommend
reviews.comments: Absolutely love the way it makes my skin feel. Yes I will buy it again

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: Perfect for oily/combo/breakout prone skin. My go-to in the summer months. Light consistency, absorbs nicely, great base for makeup. Little bit goes a long way. Definitely a staple :)

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Great texture.  Moisturizes well

reviews.headline: One of my favorites
reviews.comments: I have loved this Clinique moisturizer for years and still do.  Hope it's never discontinued.

reviews.headline: Most Hydrating Face lotion
reviews.comments: I've used many different face lotions and I always keep coming back to this one as this is the only one that really makes my face feel hydrated and helps especially in winter with dry skin. I wish it came with a Sunscreen but I still won't stop using it.

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: I have been using the Clinique Dramatically Different moisturizing gel for 10 years now and I have never switched to another during that yime. This is a great product for me personally: I have normal/dry skin with an oily T-zone. The gel is not sticky at all and the skin abosrbs the product wonderfully! Will forever buy this

reviews.headline: The one!
reviews.comments: After using tons of different moisturizers over many years I feel like I finally found "the one" that's right for me. I've been absolutely thrilled with this since purchasing it.

reviews.headline: excellent product
reviews.comments: This product really does what it promises, I love it!

reviews.headline: Wanted to love this
reviews.comments: I bought this and started using it every other day, loved how it controlled my oils then noticed after applying my face felt tight and i had patches of dry spots

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Love it, very smooth and lightweight!

reviews.headline: for oily skin only
reviews.comments: I have mixed normal to oily skin but this dried me out! only had to use 2x before realizing it wasn't for me. returned

reviews.headline: Great as a first step for mature skin
reviews.comments: This is a lightweight but effective moisturizer. I use the lotion version daily and got this for my mom to use as a first step/serum replacement for her super sensitive skin. She loves it. It absorbs quickly and she layers a heavier moisturizer on top. Doesn't irritate her skin

reviews.headline: passing the classics to my kids
reviews.comments: i used this all through high school and now my son uses it and loves it. classic products, reliable!

reviews.headline: Face feels silk and smooth
reviews.comments: I like this moisturizer. Makes my face feel nice and smooth. This is definitely for oily skin as it does dry you out a bit. If you have combination skin like me I would recommend using a serum before so your face doesnt get too dry.

reviews.headline: My skin did not like this :(
reviews.comments:
My skin is sensitive and acne prone and it did NOT like this product. It immediately makes my skin red and irritated followed by a burning sensation 

Also- the cream turns brown when oxidized I guess and there started to be brown crust stuck im the crevices of the cap, yuck. I threw out the half filled bottle

media.headline: I continue to use this product over and over again!
media.caption: ...a little mascara and lip stain!  But I started with this moisturizer!

media.headline: Nice face moisturize for oily skin
media.caption: Clinique moisturizing gel

media.headline: Nice face moisturize for oily skin
I would definitely buy this again!

faceoff_positive.comments: I love this moisturizing gel so much! The lotion was nice for keeping the skin moisturized but felt heavy on my skin. The gel though is fantastic! My skin is soft, less oily, and the product absorbs fast! It's great at prepping the face for other products and/or make-up. It's also cost-effective because it lasts so long! A tiny amount is all you need! I've been using the same bottle for two months and still have plenty! Also the pump is wonderful! It keeps everything clean and convenient! I highly recommend anyone with oilier skin to give this a try! Great work Clinique!
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Product!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I usually don't write many reviews, but have for Clinique's 3-step system. I wish I would have known these facts before purchasing these items.

I don't break out all that often, but was having a bout of constant breakouts and I couldn't find anything that worked. I switched my whole face cleansing routine to clinique products since they were allergen tested and supposed to be good for sensitive skin. I was doing everything I was supposed to, but yet still breaking out even more than before I started using Clinique.

I discovered that this gel has three ingredients in it that are listed among the highest of comedogenic (acne aggrevating) ingredients. They are Laureth-4, Laureth-23, and Oleth-10. Laureth-4 is rated a 5 on the comedogenic scale, which is the highest you can go! I stopped using this product and began using a face wash and simple lotion that are both paraben free and non-comedogenic, That together only cost me $12, and in just one week my face is completely acne free. I do not recommend this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: A comedogenic product

rollup.name: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel For Face
